attributes.action: working mans request about paying a fair share of green taxes
attributes.additional_details: why must the uk energy user pay such a disproportionate amount of surcharge/tax when compared to any other industrialised nation?10 to 11% now and rising Lets stop and rethink,wind mills that don't work when its windy?there is not the infrastructure to support wind farms at sea yet but we have lots that the tax payer is subsidising,I understand the need to conserve resources,but lets be fair.We have pensioners in fuel poverty,the low paid are struggling.IT'S TIME TO DRAW A LINE NO MORE INCREASES
